system.description: The Caster creates a cloud that obscures an Area equal to the size of the delivery (minimum 5-foot cube). It Hinders Checks relying on sight of a Target within the fog and as if Vulnerable if they are Attack Checks or Saves.
system.effect: The Caster creates a cloud that obscures an Area equal to the size of the delivery (minimum 5-foot cube). It Hinders Checks relying on sight of a Target within the fog and as if Vulnerable if they are Attack Checks or Saves.
